extendedInfo.description: [re.*(Renamer)] is batch rename tool.rename files in the directory.You can use Regular expression(Java style).if your device is OS2.0 or later,You can use Exif Date / sequential num/last Modified Date.*this application is not user friendly.*not correspond to rename the mp3 tag. Also, I do not correspond.if your device is OS2.0 or later,You can use sequential num/Exif Date/last Modified Date.You can use max 10 converted pattern history.If you rename media files, then Gallery will not find these files.because If you want, It is necessary to execute the media scanning again, by another way.Please use this application program by the self-responsibility. This application is developed by the advertising revenue.Do not use who hates advertising.if click once, The advertisement is not displayed  few days.*ads need permission.*read phone state and identity permission is granted automatically. because this application supports OS1.5.keywordfolder,directory, rename, renamer, regular expression, batch, bulk, image. photo, pict, picture, file name, format

reviews.title: Almost perfect!
reviews.comment: Great flexible file renamer.  This would be perfect for my use if (1) it could be limited to a selected subset of files within a directory; and (2) it had the ability to pinch-zoom, so this old coot could see what he was doing when entering the regexes.
reviews.author: Bret Sutton

reviews.title: HOLY QUICKNESS BATMAN
reviews.comment: I don\'t know a thing about android. Had smartphone for 6 whole months. Sheer dumb luck guessing maybe but I renamed 290 files in 3 seconds flat on my first try. Super good job.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: People, at least look at the screenshots to know what you\'re getting into. Most people using this app were probably using the terminal to do their work, but I my terminal emulator doesn\'t like the verbose switch :/ So I downloaded this :D
reviews.author: Mayki de Le\303\263n

reviews.title: useless, uninstalling!
reviews.comment: EDIT gave up on this nonsense. using File Tools instead, not perfect but at least does the deed without having to learn programming first
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs minor improvements for 5 stars
reviews.comment: Great app. Needs minor improvements though. Perhaps allowing the user to have a default and group of favorite folders. Editing, deleting or giving titles to the saved replaces would be nice. Also maybe allowing people to tick a selection of regexp\\replaces to do several all at one go.
reviews.author: Stephen Lambert

reviews.title: Wonderful
reviews.comment: Does what it says  Very fast operation  But should know how to use it  By the way I don\'t like advertising. But I am using this application
reviews.author: Safdar Bagasrawala

reviews.title: awesome app!
reviews.comment: works great, no bugs spotted so far. id3 tags support would be nice, but still 5/5.
reviews.author: Mikl Derp

reviews.title: Works Great.
reviews.comment: Does what it\'s supposed to do. Read the instructions first. I have no programmer experience or whatever it is that this app uses, but after playing with the app, reading the help, using common sense and LEARNING i was able to become proficient at using this beast of an app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Wonderful app Things that could be done are awesome.. .took about 1 month to \"completely\" figure out.(and I\'m supposed to be a math genius) .but really worth it..  For beginners, just . Is any character..   @ dev, I know you\'re Japanese.. but atleast put some more examples ..atleast 20 more for faster learning
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brilliant.
reviews.comment: Just wish I understood more complex expressions. Trying to rename all files named [000700].jpg ranging to [000799].jpg to get rid of the brackets proved awkward for me. I ended up just selecting a \'[\' then renaming then selecting the \']\' and renaming. My own fault for not understanding correct expressions though.Very handy app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Made my life easier
reviews.author: Milan Masic

reviews.title: Really Not user friendly
reviews.comment: I just need to rename a batch of photos. Not to much to ask for a \"renamer app\". But here you need to have telepathic powers to guess how. Developer, it have potential, don\'t be lazy and write a proper help!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Worked exactly like I wanted!
reviews.author: Eric Nemchik

reviews.title: Brilliant.
reviews.comment: Although it is a little hard to figure out at first, once you\'ve got it it works like a charm. There is no competitor for batch file renaming in the Play store yet, and File Tools, mentioned elsewhere, is a long shot off from what Re* can achieve with a bit of brain power.
reviews.author: Michael Pienaar

reviews.title: this is what i\'m talking about
reviews.comment: took me 5mins to understand, now i can freely use it.. thanks mr. developer
reviews.author: mark jayvee Pabilonia

reviews.title: Does the job
reviews.comment: This apparently isn\'t for everyone but if you are familiar with regular expressions it can be very useful and powerful.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Atlast foud the format renamer I was looking for...
reviews.comment: Changes the format name of a group of files in just one click....
reviews.author: Sajin S

reviews.title: good!
reviews.comment: i love using EXIF data.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: Just what I was looking for. All I wanted was to rename my pics 00001.jpg to superbowl00001.jpg. Why all the negitive reviews? It works perfectly! Thank you!
reviews.author: A Google User
